title: TypoTrip - Typography on the Road
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032945im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typotrip_4478.jpg)

\_  
**TypoTrip** is a collection of strange, worn-down, outdated, intriguing, self-made, out-of-place or interesting letters from all over the world.  
Also improvised signs, coincidental designs and random messages, eroded forms, outdated design trends and letters that have seen a better day.

Take a look or contribute to: **[typotrip.wordpress.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032945/http:/typotrip.wordpress.com/)**

Enjoy your visit!

Wojtek Mejor

p.s.  
Please feel free to share your thoughts about the web - I’m curious to know.

 [‹ A new proposal for student font licensing: single-use font licenses.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032945/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36920 "Go to previous forum topic") [Custom die cutting or laser cutting resources? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032945/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36945 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wojtekmejor
